```py
In [1]: import io

In [2]: data = """
 ...: 0,0,1
 ...: 1,1,0
 ...: 0,1,0
 ...: """
 ...: 

In [3]: df = pd.read_csv(io.StringIO(data), header=None)

In [4]: df
Out[4]: 
 0  1  2
0  0  0  1
1  1  1  0
2  0  1  0 
```

```py
In [5]: s1 = pd.Series([1, 2, 3])

In [6]: s1
Out[6]: 
0    1
1    2
2    3
dtype: int64

In [7]: s2 = pd.Series(s1, index=["foo", "bar", "baz"])

In [8]: s2
Out[8]: 
foo   NaN
bar   NaN
baz   NaN
dtype: float64 
```

```py
In [1]: import io

In [2]: data = """
 ...: 0,0,1
 ...: 1,1,0
 ...: 0,1,0
 ...: """
 ...: 

In [3]: df = pd.read_csv(io.StringIO(data), header=None)

In [4]: df

 0  1  2
0  0  0  1
1  1  1  0
2  0  1  0 
```

In [5]: s1 = pd.Series([1, 2, 3])
